means: 拒绝，回绝( refuse的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The fusty old establishment refused to recognise the demand for popular music.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一古板的老旧机构拒绝承认人们对流行音乐的需求。

sentence.Network_en: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位被警察拦下的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的证件。

sentence.Network_en: Embassy security personnel refused to admit him or his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 使馆保安人员不允许他和夫人进入。

PerfectNetExp.abs: But she also refused to admit defeat like a pigeon , the mouth does not forgive ., 但她还像只不肯认输的鸽子 , 嘴巴不饶人.
when she was arrested , she refused to say anything ., 她被捕以后 , 拒不说话.
brief research on the reasons why songzheyuan refused to sign xiangyueximu ., 宋哲元拒签 < 香月细目 > 原因初探.
his mother refused blank .他母亲直截了当地拒绝了他。

list.abs: 消防专业词汇英语翻译(P-Z) ... refuse destructor 垃圾焚化炉 refuse disposal 垃圾处置 refuse incineration 垃圾焚化.
埃克钛环保科技 ... 水处理 Water Treatment 垃圾处理 Refuse Treatment 水情监测 Hydrology Monitoring.
refuse silk 乱丝refuse wagon 垃圾车refuse yarn 废纱
refuse destructor 垃圾焚化炉refuse incinerator 垃圾焚化炉refuse receptacle 垃圾桶

entry.def: If you refuse to do something, you deliberately do not do it, or you say firmly that you will not do it.

example.ex: He refused to comment after the trial...
example.tran: 庭审之后他拒绝作出评论。

example.ex: He expects me to stay on here and I can hardly refuse.
example.tran: 他希望我继续留在这里，我很难拒绝。

entry.def: If someone refuses you something, they do not give it to you or do not allow you to have it.

example.ex: The United States has refused him a visa...
example.tran: 美国拒绝给他发放签证。

example.ex: She was refused access to her children...
example.tran: 她被禁止探视她的孩子。

entry.def: If you refuse something that is offered to you, you do not accept it.

example.ex: He offered me a second drink which I refused...
example.tran: 他请我再喝一杯，我没有接受。

example.ex: The patient has the right to refuse treatment.
example.tran: 病人有权利拒绝接受治疗。

entry.tran: 废物，垃圾（主要用于官方语言）
entry.def: Refuse consists of the rubbish and all the things that are not wanted in a house, shop, or factory, and that are regularly thrown away; used mainly in official language.

example.ex: The District Council made a weekly collection of refuse.
example.tran: 区政务委员会每周收取一次垃圾。

auth_sentence.content: Baauer himself has refused to be a poster boy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Baauer himself has refused to be a poster boy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Baauer himself has refused to be a poster boy.

auth_sentence.content: Speaker Boehner has refused to budge from his proposal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Speaker Boehner has refused to budge from his proposal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Speaker Boehner has refused to budge from his proposal.

auth_sentence.content: But the military leaders refused to hand over power.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the military leaders refused to hand over power.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the military leaders refused to hand over power.

Sentence.sentence: Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help.
The supervisor of personnel refused the request.
Why he refused to answer her call.
